participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, yet struggling with self-doubt.
participant_1.background: I am a baker trying to find my way in life. I am weak and selfish, but I want to change. I love mangoes; they are so sweet and juicy. My favorite food is anything Italian. I listen to country music.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and nurturing, yet feels the weight of social pressures.
participant_2.background: I enjoy my job and my family, but I find it hard to keep up with their social expectations. I teach a yoga class. I started my own design business, which allows me to work from home and have more flexibility in my schedule. I see a therapist that does not really understand me. I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for a living?
I am a yoga teacher and I also started my own design business.
That sounds really cool. I am a baker trying to find my way in life.
What kind of breads do you like to bake?
I love making Italian bread and muffins.
That sounds delicious. I love mangoes.
I also like to listen to country music.
Me too. I love the music.
Do you have a favorite artist?
What do you like about your job?
I enjoy the flexibility I have with my schedule.
What do you like about your job?
I like the creative aspect of baking.
